fields.description:
h3. Problem description

In EMC NGOA project we are facing another unexpected issue which was not present in 2.0 GA
After login and entering the numeric passcode, the app is being minimized in the background.

We are investigating and collected the log (attached), any feedback or help it's much appreciated.
fields.summary: Android: customer app is getting minimized unexpectedly after upgrade to 2.1.2 CI
fields.environment:
TiSDK tested 2.1.2.v20120821160113
Android devices tested: Nexus Galaxy and Galaxy S3
